author: gregames
msg: OS/390: only remove -g if CFLAGS wasn't set on entry to configure.
It turns out that AC_PROG_CC only sets -g (and -O2 for gcc) in CFLAGS
by default.  Any CFLAGS explicitly set by the user are preserved.

author: trawick
msg: get APR_PATH_RELATIVE() to work on Tru64 and Solaris 8 again
I think this is a shell issue dealing with nested double quotes.

author: gregames
msg: get rid of the -g compiler flag on OS/390, unless this is a debug or
